# How to run the QA app on Windows
# If your project path contains spaces, always use double quotes around paths and arguments.
# Example (PowerShell or CMD):
# "& "C:\Users\Alex Kaplun\source\repos\LLamaCppTest1\build\bin\Release\qa_app.exe" "C:\Users\Alex Kaplun\source\repos\LLamaCppTest1\data\sample.txt" "How tall is the Eiffel Tower?""
# This ensures Windows correctly parses the executable and file paths.

# Download bge-small-en ONNX model from:
# https://huggingface.co/BAAI/bge-small-en-v1.5/resolve/main/model.onnx
# Place model.onnx here
